question: # --- Deeper Professional & Work Life ---
What aspect of your work do you find most rewarding?
Describe a time you had to work with a difficult colleague. How did you handle it?
What's the best piece of career advice you've ever received?
How do you stay motivated on projects that you find uninteresting?
What is your ideal work environment like?
If you weren't in your current field, what other career would you pursue?
What's the biggest risk you've taken professionally and did it pay off?
How do you handle feedback or criticism?
What tools or apps are essential for your productivity?
Describe your leadership style, or how you prefer to be managed.
What's your biggest workplace pet peeve?
What's a common misconception about your job?
# --- Personal History & Background ---
Where did you go to school/college and what did you study?
What was your first job?
What's a favorite memory you have from your childhood?
Who was the most influential person in your life growing up?
What's a major life event that shaped who you are today?
What's something you miss about being a kid?
How has your family influenced your life and values?
What was your hometown like?
What's a tradition you or your family have?
What's one thing you wish you had learned sooner in life?
# --- Values
What does 'success' mean to you, outside of work?
What are you most grateful for right now?
What's an opinion you hold that many people might disagree with?
What cause or issue are you passionate about?
How do you approach making big life decisions?
What does 'happiness' mean to you?
Is there a quote or mantra you live by?
What's one thing you believe everyone should experience at least once?
How important is spirituality or religion in your life?
What is a principle you will never compromise on?
# --- Daily Life & Habits ---
Describe your typical morning routine.
Describe your typical evening routine.
How do you unwind and relax after a stressful day?
Are you a planner or do you prefer to be spontaneous?
What's one habit you're proud of?
What's one habit you're trying to break or build?
How do you organize your day? (e.g., to-do lists, calendar, etc.)
What does your typical diet look like?
Do you enjoy cooking? What's your signature dish?
How much sleep do you usually get?
# --- Hypotheticals & Creativity ---
If you could have dinner with any three people (living or dead), who would they be?
If you won a 1 crore lottery, what are the first five things you would do?
If you could have any superpower, what would it be and why?
If you could live in any fictional universe, which one would you choose?
If you could instantly become an expert in something, what would it be?
What would you do if you had an extra hour every day?
If you could write a book, what genre would it be and what would it be about?
What's something you want to do before you die?
If you had to describe yourself as an animal, what would it be?
What would be the title of your autobiography?
# --- Relationships & Social Life ---
What do you value most in a friendship?
Are you a better talker or listener?
How do you prefer to communicate (text, call, in-person)?
Describe your ideal social gathering.
Do you prefer a large group of friends or a few close ones?
How do you show people you appreciate them?
What is your approach to conflict resolution in personal relationships?
What's the best gift you've ever given or received?
How do you like to celebrate your birthday?
What's your take on social media for maintaining friendships?
# --- Favorites & Preferences (Expanded) ---
What's your go-to comfort food?
What's your favorite thing about living in Bengaluru?
What's your favorite type of weather?
What's your favorite holiday?
Do you prefer mountains or beaches for a vacation?
What's a movie that you can watch over and over again?
What's your favorite board game or video game?
What's your favorite smell?
What form of art do you enjoy the most (e.g., painting, music, theatre)?
What is your favorite app on your phone and why?
If you could only listen to one album for the rest of your life, what would it be?
What's your favorite time of day?
# --- Self-Reflection & Personal Growth ---
What is your greatest personal strength?
What is a weakness you are actively working on?
When do you feel most confident?
How have you changed as a person in the last five years?
What are you most proud of in your personal life?
What's something you've done that was completely out of your comfort zone?
How do you define personal growth?
What's a mistake you made that taught you a valuable lesson?
What are you currently feeling optimistic about?
What is one goal you have for yourself in the next year?
